title: (Thurs Full) Amy Reviews Bobby’s Thank You Note from Wedding Gift + Bobby Tries to Make a Love Connection with Trucker Joe and Phone Screener Abby + Lunchbox Auditions for People in the Drive-Thru
itunes:title: (Thurs Full) Amy Reviews Bobby’s Thank You Note from Wedding Gift + Bobby Tries to Make a Love Connection with Trucker Joe and Phone Screener Abby + Lunchbox Auditions for People in the Drive-Thru
description:
Amy brings in the thank you note she just received from Bobby. She reads and reviews the entire note. Trucker Joe left a voicemail saying he thought Abby was ‘sexy’ in the Baecation Part 2 music video. He then calls in and we try to make a love connection. Lunchbox is getting ready for his big audition tomorrow and goes out to audition for people in the drive-thru and he also calls his acting coach for advice.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
